CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ITS_Surveys" , IF( ISBLANK( ITS_Question_1c__c),0, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=9, 1, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=10,1,0))),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ITS_FS_ITS" , IF( ISBLANK( ITS_Question_1c__c),0, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=9, 1, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=10,1,0))),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ITS_Pworld" , IF( ISBLANK( ITS_Question_1c__c),0, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=9, 1, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=10,1,0))),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ITS_FS_Surveys_Flight_Sentinel" , IF( ISBLANK( ITS_Question_1c__c),0, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=9, 1, IF( ITS_Question_1c__c=10,1,0))),
IF( ISBLANK(Overall_satisfaction__c),0, IF( Overall_satisfaction__c =9, 1, IF( Overall_satisfaction__c =10,1,0)))))))
CustomField.label: OS Promoter
